member.name: T:StratTicTacToe.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:StratTicTacToe.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:StratTicTacToe.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:StratTicTacToe.Game.ClearAll
member.summary: set all boards to empty, allow players to click on any tile, and set the player to "X" 0=empty,1=x,2=0

member.name: M:StratTicTacToe.Game.CheckWin(System.Boolean,System.Int16,System.Int16)
member.summary: if game or board is won, tied, or neither - Returns 1, 2, or 0 respectively
member.param: If True: checking a game. If False: checking the bigBoard
Relevant for games only: Vertical Coordinate of the game
Relevant for games only: Horizontal Coordinate of the game

member.name: M:StratTicTacToe.Game.ChangePlayer
member.summary: changes information to identify which player's turn it is

member.name: M:StratTicTacToe.Game.ChangeKey(System.Int16,System.Int16)
member.summary: changes clickKey to give access to certain tiles clickKey is coordinates of the game on the bigBoard
member.param: Vertical coordinate for the game being redirected to
Horizontal coordinate for the game being redirected to

member.name: M:StratTicTacToe.Game.DisplayHighlight(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.param: Vertical coordinate of game being highlighted
Horizontal coordinate of game being highlighted

member.name: M:StratTicTacToe.Game.TileClick(System.Int16,System.Int16,System.Int16,System.Int16)
member.summary: Updates boards, checks win, displays win, changes key, and updates notClicked
member.param: Verticle Coordinate of the game currently being played on
Horizontal Coordinate of the game currently being played on
Verticle Coordinate of the tile selected
Horizontal Coordinate of the tile selected
